Package ru.practicum.event

Class EventServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.practicum.event.EventServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventService
    @Service
@Transactional(readOnly=true)
public class EventServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventService
    Base implementation of service-layer interface, containing business-logic and linked to Event
    Version:
    1.0

      • getEventsFiltered

        public java.util.List<EventDtoShort> getEventsFiltered​(java.lang.String text,
                                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Long> categoriesIds,
                                                       java.lang.Boolean paid,
                                                       java.lang.String rangeStart,
                                                       java.lang.String rangeEnd,
                                                       java.lang.Boolean onlyAvailable,
                                                       java.lang.String sort,
                                                       java.lang.Integer from,
                                                       java.lang.Integer size,
                                                       java.lang.String ip)
        Method provide ability to get information of events, filtered by variety of parameters
        Specified by:
        getEventsFiltered in interface EventService
        Parameters:
        text - text to search in the contents of the annotation and a detailed description of the event
        categoriesIds - the list of ids of the categories in which the search will be conducted
        paid - search for paid/free events only
        rangeStart - date and time not earlier than when the event should occur
        rangeEnd - date and time no later than which the event should occur
        onlyAvailable - only events that have not reached the limit of participation requests
        sort - Sorting option: by event date or by number of views
        from - the number of events that need to be skipped to form the current list
        size - number of events in the list
        ip - ip of requester
        Returns:
        list of events

      • getAllEventsByAdmin

        Specified by:

        rangeStart - date and time not earlier than when the event should occur
        rangeEnd - date and time no later than which the event should occur
        from - the number of events that need to be skipped to form the current list
        size - number of events in the list
